alert.note: Alert for Coastal Taylor; Inland Taylor (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 6:17AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Taylor County through 700 AM EDT... At 617 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Perry to 14 miles south of St. Marks to 14 miles southeast of Carrabelle. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Adams Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
